about_the_game:
At 'Only Pinball' you can expect pinball tables in the style of the 80s, 90s and modern.
You get realistic physics, elaborately modeled tables, atmospheric lighting, high-quality sounds and exciting themes.
Play alone or with up to 4 friends and chase the high score.
Adjust the strength of your pinball fingers and choose one of the 3 settings.
Of course, you can also play with 5 balls if 3 balls aren't enough for you.

Only Pinball is a pinball collection that is continually being expanded. Exciting new topics as well as improved classics from “Malzbie’s Pinball Collection” will be found here.

At 'Only Pinball' you can expect pinball tables in the style of the 80s, 90s and modern.
You get realistic physics, elaborately modeled tables, atmospheric lighting, high-quality sounds and exciting themes.
Play alone or with up to 4 friends and chase the high score.
Adjust the strength of your pinball fingers and choose one of the 3 settings.
Of course, you can also play with 5 balls if 3 balls aren't enough for you.

Only Pinball is a pinball collection that is continually being expanded. Exciting new topics as well as improved classics from “Malzbie’s Pinball Collection” will be found here.

name: Only Pinball Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core I5 3Ghz
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia 960 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Direct Sound capatible card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core I5 3Ghz
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidea 3060 or equivalent (for 4K)
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Direct Sound capatible card

short_description: At 'Only Pinball' you can expect pinball tables in the style of the 80s, 90s and modern. You get realistic physics, elaborately modeled tables, atmospheric lighting, high-quality sounds and exciting themes.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Portugal
*languages with full audio support
